item.title: Robots.txt
item.description: Added enableRobotsTXT = false to the config file

item.title: Google Analytics
item.description: Added the following to config.toml to setup Google Analytics: [params.googleTagManager] id = “id…”

item.title: Setup Replit for my new blog
item.description: So I read this link to help me setup Replit to use Hugo. Build and host your company blog on Replit with Nix and Hugo - DEV Community Open `replit.nix` and append `pkgs.hugo`to the `deps` list In the shell, run: hugo new site --force . cd themes && git clone https://github.com/panr/hugo-coder && cd .. Add the following line to the bottom of `config.toml`: theme = 'hugo-coder' Add: run = "hugo server --buildDrafts --buildFuture --bind 0.
